meanings.sent1: The test results showed the determinableness of the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent2: Her determinableness in solving complex puzzles impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The determinableness of the missing piece in the jigsaw puzzle made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His determinableness to finish the marathon was like a strong wind pushing him forward.
meanings.sent5: The determinableness of the answer was like a bright light in the darkness of uncertainty.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be ascertained or decided.
meanings.sent1: The determinableness of the winner in the race was clear from the start.
meanings.sent2: The determinableness of the truth in the matter brought peace to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The determinableness of the weather forecast made the meteorologist smile.
meanings.sent4: Her determinableness in choosing the right path was like a compass guiding her way.
meanings.sent5: The determinableness of the decision was like a solid rock in the midst of confusion.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be resolved or settled.
meanings.sent1: The determinableness of the conflict brought relief to the community.
meanings.sent2: The determinableness of the issue allowed for a quick resolution.
meanings.sent3: The determinableness of the argument turned into a friendly debate.
meanings.sent4: The determinableness of the outcome was like a calm sea after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The determinableness of the puzzle solution was like finding the last piece to complete the picture.
